comments:
Builds: 2.0 M6 (also seeing it 1.5.3 with a non-Tomcat server adapter)

Starting this in wst.server, however, it looks like there are both server and j2ee issues here.

Got the following NPE attempting to publish a server instance after closing one of the associated (already published) projects. Ideally, a project accessibility check should be performed within the server framework prior to calling members()  and either a user friendly error message would be generated or the closed project would be ignored for computation of the IModules list (the j2ee logic should also perform such checks much earlier and not getting to the NPE point).

...
!ENTRY org.eclipse.wst.server.core 4 0 2007-04-16 11:06:28.171
!MESSAGE Could not publish to the server.
!STACK 0
java.lang.NullPointerException
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.resources.VirtualComponent.getMetaResources(VirtualComponent.java:198)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.resources.VirtualContainer.members(VirtualContainer.java:158)
	at org.eclipse.wst.common.componentcore.internal.resources.VirtualContainer.members(VirtualContainer.java:141)
	at org.eclipse.wst.web.internal.deployables.ComponentDeployable.getMembers(ComponentDeployable.java:202)
	at org.eclipse.jst.j2ee.internal.deployables.J2EEFlexProjDeployable.members(J2EEFlexProjDeployable.java:220)
	at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.ModulePublishInfo.fillCache(ModulePublishInfo.java:277)
	at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.ModulePublishInfo.getDelta(ModulePublishInfo.java:327)
	at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.ServerPublishInfo.getDelta(ServerPublishInfo.java:360)
	at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server.getPublishedResourceDelta(Server.java:1047)
	at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.model.ServerBehaviourDelegate.getPublishedResourceDelta(ServerBehaviourDelegate.java:547)
	at org.eclipse.jst.server.tomcat.core.internal.TomcatServerBehaviour.getPublishedResourceDelta(TomcatServerBehaviour.java:868)
	at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.model.ServerBehaviourDelegate.publish(ServerBehaviourDelegate.java:611)
	at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server.doPublish(Server.java:877)
	at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.Server.publish(Server.java:864)
	at org.eclipse.wst.server.core.internal.PublishServerJob.run(PublishServerJob.java:72)
	at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
...
Will avoid calling members() on closed projects and change the default server behaviour delegate to not re-publish closed projects.
